named-native-query.name: ThemeComment.findTopThemeComments
named-native-query.query: select theme_comment.theme_comment_id, @temp \:= (count(good.good_id) + datediff(now(), theme_comment.reg_date) * -0.05), if(@temp < 0, 0, @temp) as weighted from theme_comment left join good on good.refer_id = theme_comment.theme_comment_id and good.is_good = 1 and good.gtype = "CT" group by theme_comment.theme_comment_id order by weighted desc, theme_comment.theme_comment_id desc limit 10

named-native-query.name: Theme.findTopThemes
named-native-query.query: select theme_with_comment.theme_id, (comment_cnt+zim_cnt)*comment_star_avg as weighted from ( select theme.theme_id, count(theme_comment.theme_comment_id) as comment_cnt, ifnull(avg(theme_comment.star), 0) as comment_star_avg from theme left join theme_comment on theme_comment.theme_id = theme.theme_id and theme_comment.is_deleted = 0 group by theme.theme_id ) as theme_with_comment join ( select theme.theme_id, count(zim.zim_id) as zim_cnt from theme left join zim on zim.refer_id = theme.theme_id and zim.is_zim = 1 and zim.ztype = "T" group by theme.theme_id ) as theme_with_zim on theme_with_zim.theme_id = theme_with_comment.theme_id order by weighted desc, theme_with_comment.theme_id desc limit 10
